name: Music_2734.wav
caption: This is a punk rock piece that is being sung by children. The main vocal is a boy singing in a shouting manner while slightly straying off-key. There is an electric guitar and acoustic drums in the backing track of a song. The piece is clearly targeted for children. Therefore, it would fit perfectly in a play date or birthday party for little kids. The music is also suitable for an advertisement jingle that is targeted at kids.
